With the warm sun and bright clean sea in full view, Dani relaxes to work on her tan. She feels like a new person now after purchasing a new swimsuit for today as she spends it well with her friends. "I've never had any time to just really unwind." Her friend gives up, since she's wasting valuable time away from volleyball to reason with her. Dani slowly falls into a deep sleep...

When she wakes up, she finds herself swimming through her new swimsuit. As she struggles, she escapes into a bright blinding light. The fibers of her towel look enormous. The sand looks like enlarged gravel. And she realized she somehow shrunk less than an inch tall. She feels herself rise as she remains still in the discarded swimsuit. She peers out to find her captor is a...

152122.content:
The rise caused me to tumble into the crater that was once the cup for my swimsuit. It didn't take me long for me to roll over and get a good view of the guy who's holding my stuff, hugging the fabric all the while in embarrassment.

He's definitely a tall guy, maybe a bit taller than other guys his age. He has messy blonde hair and is wearing a pair of dark sunglasses. His face has soft cheekbones, broad nose, and an angled chin that has minimal stubble. He's got a tanned and built beach body with well-defined muscles. Clad in a pair of red speedos and flip-flops, he holds in the pit of his arm a typical red lifeguard float. And beside his right thigh, he holds in a gingerly way my swimsuit - and me without knowing.

I catch his gaze, but with the glasses; I can't see well if he sees me or not. Frightened I hug close to the inside of the cup. The angle of his face and glasses shifts away from me towards something far away. What's he looking at? The sides of his mouth and forehead crease almost in bewilderment. His head turns from side to side in a panoramic fashion, the same confused look on his face.

He keeps this face as the world around me sways like a hammock. He starts to walk. The swaying feels almost comfortable like a lazy afternoon hammock nap - not what I expected since of how small I am and how big he is to me. Still, my normal-sized top taps against the side of his thigh on occasion, more like plain turbulence or rough sees on a cruise ship.

The lifeguard must be going to...
152122.title: Tanned muscular lifeguard

1521222.content:
I nearly fell asleep during the whole walk. It wasn't until my suit swung against his thigh and flipped me over inside the bikini cup. When I look up at his face, he didn't look curious about my clothes again. There's no sun, only a dull multi-colored sky - maybe I'm under an umbrella or canopy of some kind.

The lifeguard, silent all the time he unknowingly carried me and my swimsuit, shouts. "Brad!"

I had to brush off the shock of his voice. It's deep, but it feels like thunder to my ears. "Hey, Brad! Get over here!"

I can't see Brad, but I could hear him beyond the cup. "What's going on, bro?"

The sunglasses turn back to the hand with my swimsuit. "Found this bikini lying in the sand, not close to the shoreline. Did you see a naked lady runnin around here?"

"You serious, bro? Sounds hot..."

"Clearly I'm the only serious one here, Brad. You might wanna go check the beach. Dunno how to explain that to any kids..."

"Lemme go look, bro. What about her clothes?"

"She'll come lookin for them. I'll just toss em into one of the stalls here."

"Why don't you hold ont..."

"How about you go look for her, Brad?"

Loud stamps in the sand follow.

Things get darker as the lifeguard opens a changing room stall. Still with the weak grip on my swimsuit, he swings it from side to side. I could see his thigh getting closer and farther - less of the calm hammock ride and more like a roller coaster.

He tosses my swimsuit into the stall and shuts the door.

But during that whole time, I was left...
1521222.title: Wanted on the Beach

choices: He does not feel her; Dani travels with him for some time.
He feels her immediately and stops to check.
15213.content:
The shrinking happened in an instant. A mere moment ago Dani was walking out of the restroom, thinking about how hot the day is and how she should go get herself an icecream; she was amidst deciding between lemon and phistachio when it hit her. There was no bright flash, no loud sounds and no particular feeling was associated with the process; the only thing that changed was perspective. The young woman realised all of a sudden, that she lookis at the world from a height of several inches above the tiled wet floor.
For a second Dani lost the ability to breathe.
"Holy shit", - she whimpered in shock. Her mind froze. The woman closed her eyes and tried counting to ten, but couldn't finish the count, opening her eyes back at "six".
"Oh my god", - Dani's legs could not hold her anymore and she sank to the floor. Thoughts were racing; her gaze wandered aimlessly around the massive surroundings. Walls extending hundreds of meters into the sky, huge white sinks, shining metal of the faucets. It was the most surreal sight she had ever seen. Dani felt nauseous.
She spent several minutes like that, just trying to take in the impossible reality. She shrunk! That does not just happen to people! At least it never did until this very moment: what if all the other people at the hotel's swimming pool ended up in the same predicament?

As if to answer her question, the huge restroom door - the one she effortlessly opened just several minutes ago but couldn't even dream of getting past now - swiftly opened, sending a gust of wind which disheveled Dani's hair. An unknown woman walked in: an impressive, fantastic sight. She must have been in her early twenties, her body toned and athletic, and wore a pink/white swimming costume as well as simple blue foam flip-flops.

Dani's mind went into a slow motion mode: the stranger was walking very slowly, and the closer she was getting, the more transfixed the tiny woman's gaze became on one of those very flip-flops. She couldn't help but imagine herself a bloody stain on one of the wide, blackened soles, and this thought scared her to no end. Dani suddenly realised how vulnerable she was. She had to find help.

The larger woman stepped over her head - a lucky occasion, since shocked Dani most probably wouldn't have been able to dodge if the well-pedicured size 8 foot was to descend on her. Giantess disappeared in one of the cabins.
"Should I try to contact her?" - Dani wondered, rising up. It seemed the most logical thing: don't leave the bathroom, try to get help from the first person you see to minimize the risk. But the thought of walking in on a person amidst their toilet usage repulsed her; and so instead she sighed and rushed for the door before someone else was to enter. She almost slipped several times: the floor which seemed slightly wet to het before was now like a huge never-ending puddle with the water level reaching her ankles. Nevertheless, she made it to the door without much trouble, fueled by desperation.

And just as she exited the women's restroom, she encountered another giant. He was leaning to a wall opposite of her, waiting for something right my men's toilet. Medium build, around six feet tall, wearing surfer shorts and a plain white t-shirt; his feet in leather sandals. Dani liked him on the first sight: the guy looked fairly handsome and wasn't busy with anything - less chance that he will absent-mindedly consider her a bug! And so she decided. The tiny woman sprinted across the coridor, praying that he does not decide to leave until she can reach him.

Her plan worked. In several minuted Dani was standing in front of his large - size ten at least - sandal-clad feet. He did not seem to have noticed her yet, which meant she had to get his attention. Dani sighed: this was not going to be easy.
She approached his right foot cautiously, watching out for the slightest signs of movement. Luck was on her side: the guy was standing perfectly still so far. Dani climbed on the edge of his sandal, right in front of his large, round toes. Those were fairly well-kept for a guy: nails carefully cut, no signs of callouses; the smell was ever so faint, natural but not excessive. If anything the stench of chlorine used to sterilize the water in the pool was much stronger.

Dani crouched in front of his toes - and at that very moment the guy started moving. She fell face first into the crevice between his first and second toes - which saved her, because that position was secure enough to not let her fall out when he took his first step. "Stop!" - she exclaimed, trying to get a hold of his skin with her hands...
15213.title: Dani shrinks at the pool...

choices: They safely arrive at the giant's destination.

152131.content:
Up. Down. Up and down. Rapid ascend followed by abrupt fall. Dani held on for her dear life: she risked getting thrown out of her improvised seating between the huge toes every time the man's foot slammed into the floor.
"How come he still hasn't felt me?" - she wondered amidst the never-ending cycle of giant's walking process. Hell, if she accidentally caught an insect between her own toes she would instanty feel it, no doubt. And she was quite a bit bigger than any common insect in her current state. Is her carrier so absorbed in thought or maybe his tactile sense is just really underdeveloped? The question remained unanswered for the time being, however. She could only wait.

In the meantime the man walked around the swimming pool, carefully avoiding people sunbathing and children splashing water in all directions. Dani could feel his walking pace increase slightly, and, as a result, his footsteps became harder. She nervously thought about how unfortunate it would actually be to get caught out in a way of a giant like him: she would be turned into a fine red paste in a matter of a fraction of a second, without a doubt! The tiny woman made more effort to stay in place, wedging herself a little bit further between the toes.

"Hopefully he does not decide to scrunch those randomly".
152131.title: Private Transport

choices: Tom knew all along, he was the one who shrunk her!
He really did not notice her up until now: what a lack of attention!
1521311.content:
Dani's trip must have lasted less than ten minutes, but for her it felt like an eternity; so when the giant finally stopped, she let out a loud sigh of relief. That was quite an adventure! Being the size of a large bug still scared her to no end, but at least it was going to bring some memorable experiences. Hopefully there will be a way to reverse this though...

The man who carried her sat down and stretched his legs in front of him. Dani could not figure out too much, but it seemed like they were at one of the hotel's cafe places, occupying a single table in the corner. There did not seem to be many people around: some tables in the distance were occupied by families with kids. That was all she managed to notice in the short time she was given to assess the situation. She forgot to het out of her seat between the man's toes in the process, however.

And paid for it. The massive digits to both sides of her started moving without aby kind of warning: he did scrunch them in the end! Dani had to make a decision in the split-second: try to get out immediately or group up and hope none of her bones break? She chose the second option, raised her hands to her face and her knees to her chest, curling up into a small ball. Or, at least, that was the plan.

What was a simple movement for a giant who wanted to scratch an itch was a brutal mashing for Dani. His large, well-kept toes pressed on her and for a moment she was sure she will get squished: so much power those mighty digits had in them! Now that they were not walking and the wind was not blowing in her face, the smell of his feet also started getting to her, although it was not particularly gross: the man clearly showered regularly and probably visited the swimming pool a couple times today, too. Still, feet were feet.

His toes easily broke through her defensive curl, forcing her into the worn insole of the sandal in a pityful attempt to hide from the assault. One of her legs got caught between two of the digits and for a moment Dani was fully expecting it to break. She got lucky, however, and managed to free it just before his large toe pressed onto her tiny head, causing her to release a muffled scream.

And amidst all of this she heard faint voices:
"Hey Tom!" - a woman, probably the waitress. - "How're you doing today?"
"Hey Emily! I'm good, thanks. Your day going well?"
"It is, actually. Few customers today. Got some time to relax too. What do you want today?"
"Oh, I just planned on getting one of the those icecream cakes you serve hear. And a frappe. It's too hot today".
"Got it. Five minutes."
While they were talking, Dani found herself stretched out along the surface of the sandal under the young man's toes. The position allowed very little movement: his warm flesh seemed to be everywhere, and barely any light was reaching her eyes. But at least she did not get too hurt in the process...
"That'll be something else to remember later", - she decided absent-mindedly, still in a state of mild disbelief after she got so effortlessly toyed with beneath Tom's notice.

Or not?

As soon as the waitress left, his toes lifted off her; and before she had time to collect herself, the man's hand descended from above, easily snatching up her tiny form in the strong fingers of his. Tom lifted her from under the table, carefully holding on her sides. Their eyes finally met - and Dani understood something before the first word was spoken...
1521311.title: They safely arrive at the giant's destination.

choices: Obey and crawl into his sandal.
Make a run for it - surely he won't chase across the cafe?
15213111.content:
Tom was smiling; the sight of his impeccably white teeth intimidated Dani. His eyes - which turned out to be of dark green colour - studied her with amusement. The tiny woman felt chills running down her spine.

"You probably have questions, Dani", - he said, running one of his fingers along her long hair, as if petting her on the head.
"How... How do you know my name? What does all of this mean?!" - she squeaked. She weakly tried to get out of his grip - to no effect.
"I know a lot about you. I know you are having a holiday alone, for example. I know you did not tell your relatives where you are going for your vacation. And there are things I know about you that even you are unaware of!" - he laughed. - "Anyways, I didn't really plan to talk to you right now, but I guess you deserve to know some basic outline of what's happening from now on".
Dani could not answer him; words would not come out of her mouth. This man has been stalking her before...whatever he did to her! How is that even possible? Is Tom some kind of a young genius who uses his secret invention to turn people into dolls? Or are supernatural forces involved?
She kind of liked his face, though. She would definitely consider him attractive had they met in a different setting. Besides, he had nice feet. Dani had always had a thing for feet: she loved it when men looked after their peds. Giving her boyfriends regular foot massages used to be one of her favourite ways to spend time together. Especially with her last boyfriend, Derek. He was a basketball player, much taller than her, and whevener he would come to her place after practice he would almost immediately plop his huge size 14s in her lap, so that she could work on his tired soles for at least half an hour. As long as it made both of them happy, why not?

Those thoughts were kind of irrelevant now, though. She could not think of her kidnapper in the same way, regardless of how attractive he was.

"I'll grow you back in a week, when it's time for you flight back home, if you just do what I say during this time", - Tom continued, his smile never leaving his face. - "See, the moment I saw you a couple days ago I just knew I had to play with you for some time. You are not the first, you won't be the last, and if you obey, you will come out of this safe and sound. Getting it, tiny?"
She nodded. What could she say? He was so confident; he clearly planned all of this in advance.
"Alright. You've done a good job so far, but I don't like the silence. Talk to me. Address me as Tom."
"Okay, Tom", - she mumbled. - "How...how do I know you will actually release me?"
"You don't", - Tom shrugged. - "Can't offer you anything except my word. I'll let you go. I have no reason to hold on to you, the supply of toys around here is never ending. I could take in Emily the waitress next". - he noticed nonchalantly. Dani wondered if he actually ever thinks of other people as actual living people...critisizing him out loud probably was not her best option, though.
"What are you going to do to me?" - she asked instead.
"Whatever I want, but I am generally pretty nice", - he petted her on the head again. - "Nice as in "I am not going to kill you". There are ground rules. Ground, because most of the time you will be on the ground, get it? See, I really liked it when you were under my toes. You are going to spend a lot more time down there, pet. That'll be your general level of existence for the next few days. At my feet."

What the fuck? Is he reading her mind or something?

"This makes no sense", - she whispered angrily. - "And sounds humiliating".
"This is exactly the way I wanted you to take it!" - Tom laughed. - "Oh, look, Emily is coming back. Now, I'll put you back on the floor and you are going to climb back into one my sandals, don't care which. Put yourself under my toes, like you were before. You've got a minute, after that I'll stomp you flat for disobeying. Here we go!"

With that, his hand swiftly brought her back under the table, without a chance to say anything else. Tom carelessly dumped Dani on the floor by his feet, leaving her there in utter disbelief of what just happened.
15213111.title: Tom had planned all of this...

choices: Tom brings Dani home - more fun ahead!
152131111.content:
And so she was lying at his gigantic feet again, trying to comprehend everything she had just heard. The guy was clearly out of his mind. A dangerous, obsessed, perverted sociopath, a misogynistic one at that. "Oh god, why me?" - whispered Dani under her breath.
She had to make a decision. Could she run now? Crossing the entirety of the cafe would be dangerous: he will notice her in the open and might pretend to go to the bathroom just to step on her. Dani could easily imagine her tiny body breaking, squishing under his mighty tread. That was definitely not how she wanted to die!
Although she could also try to catch a ride on Emily's foot. The waitress was approaching the table again, her feet in leather gladiator sandals.
"Wait! If I run from Tom who will grow me back?" - caught herself Dani. Who knows, maybe he really is the only person who could return her to normal? Regardless of how demeaning Tom's requests were going to be, she had to endure if she wanted to have a chance. After all, he said it was going to be just one week: surely that's not too bad? Get out of his hands, report the sick fucker to the police and go back home. Sounds like a plan.

The tiny woman sighed, braced herself and walked up to Tom's left foot. She touched his smallest toe, hoping he would at least raise those a bit so that she could get in freely, but the man either did not feel her or pretended not to. Dani clenched her teeth: this was going to be a very long week. Inhaling as much fresh air as she could, she lowered herself and started crawling headfirst into the narrow crevice between his toes and the insole of his sandal. All of it was already familiar to her: the heat emanating from his flesh, the faint masculine odor, the slight dampness caused by his sweating. Like a lowly worm she squirmed and crawled her way in, firmly lodging herself underneath the giant toes.

That was it. No way back: clearly this must have been one of the most demeaning things she could possibly do for him. She accepted her fate without putting up a real fight and no matter what happens next the stage was already set: the master has found himself a new slave to entertain him.

And Tom immediately reinforced this idea by happily tapping his toes on her trapped body. The largest of them was right next to her face and the man made a point of repeatedly pressing it on her head. Her hair was slowly getting soaked in his sweat. His smell... Admittedly, the smell was okay, even likable to a degree, although Dani was deeply ashamed of thinking that. The way Tom moved his toes all over her body told Dani that he has been doing it many times already, probably to many different women; she just happened to be the next pebble to get in his shoe. He enjoyed it, but probably not in an excited way...it felt more like he was very comfortable. His tiny prisoner was an accessory to him right now.

And so it continued: Tom sitting at his table, eating his icecream cake and chatting with Emily, while helpless Dani was reduced to a mere plaything in his sandal, one to amuse himself with absent-mindedly.
152131111.title: Dani reluctantly obeys.

choices: Rules acknowledged. Much more foot fun ahead!
Pride prevails over self-preservation. Dani rebels!
1521311111.content:
Tom was finished with his dessert in less than fifteen minutes, but those lasted like an eternity for Dani. His meaty toes never stopped playing with her: scrunching, pressing, curling, it was going on and on without giving her beat up body any time to rest. She had always considered herself rather healthy: not exactly athletic, but not scrawny either; definitely in good shape. Right now, though, her body was already slowly giving in to the merciless pounding of Tom's toes. How could something so soft be so hard on her puny shape? And his toes were indeed rather soft, She would've loved massaging those if the situation was just a bit more normal; that is, without the psycho-pervert-shrinker part.

He caught her offguard when he started walking again; she was so absorbed in the process of getting played with that she never heard him finishing up his meal and saying goodbyes to the waitress. Last time he walked Dani was positioned inbetween his toes, which despite being not exactly the most comfortable way of travelling ever was still a thousand times better than what she had to experience now. Each step was just that for Tom, a mere step, one of many, but not for his tiny prisoner. When his heel touched the ground, she felt an impact, one strong enough to reach her through the sole of the sandal and make her teeth click; during the first couple of minutes she almost bit off her own tongue because of that. He would then momentarily transfer his weight onto the front of his foot to make the next step, and for the shortest of moments she would feel it - and scream in pain, because that's how bad it was. "Does he even care about not killing me here? Probably not. He could always just take someone else if I die. Seems like I won't be ever grown back - he will just dispose of me in the process of this abuse..." Nevertheless, her body was strong enough to withstand those moments of pressure without breaking, which made her a bit proud of herself.

Dani may have surrendered physically when she agreed to climb underneath his toes, but mentally she was still only halfway there. She had always been mostly an optimistic and confident person - one strong-willed individual. She was also realistic, however, and did not want to die in a stupid fashion. The woman was only going to follow the orders because the other alternative would be death: Tom made that clear to her.

At least that has been her stance so far.

The pattern of his footsteps changed. He was now going up a staircase, she realised quickly. Another half a minute - and she heard faint clicking of a key being turned in a lock. They have arrived, but where?

Step forward. Door closes with a thud. Will she ever leave this place, will the door ever close behind her on her way out when this ends? She was going to make it so. Dani wanted to survive through this predicament no matter what. Preferably without suffering much trauma in the process.

"Alright, get out, pet", - she heard from above. "Fucking finally!" - angrily whispered Dani into the toepad resting on her face and started squirming out from under the toes. She squirmed...and squirmed...and squirmed... and then realised at last that she is stuck. The pounding she received severely affected her physical capabilities and now she could not free herself from the grasp of his heavy digits. At all.
"What, did you like it there so much?"
"Fuck off", - replied Dani, trying one last time before admitting her defeat. Luckily, Tom did not hear her.
"Oh, I got it. Not the first time." - and he lifted his toes off her delicate form, allowing the tiny woman some fresh air. She inhaled hungrily and rolled off the sandal in a clumsy way; the cold tile of the floor soothed her skin. And then she looked up.
Her captor was standing above her, a mighty and beautiful, yet so cruel and crazy, giant. He was lazily kicking off his sandals to the side; a quick glance told Dani that's his shoe closet, filled with flip-flops, sandals, sneakers and even a couple pairs of dress shoes. An impressive collection even on the first sight.

"Welcome to your new home, pet", - he announced with a smile, crouching over her. - "Aw, such an angry little face! Anyways, here are the ground rules, which I mentioned earlier. I expect you to follow all of them without any doubt or questions, unless the questions are directed at improving your service to me. So. First things first, you call me Tom, because our relationship is kinda casual. You know what I mean? You are my pet, my slave, my possession, but the reason is like really simple: this situation fits us both really well. So don't be intimidated and call me Tom, not Master, or Owner, or some other stupid term. Those are implied anyways. The plane was preparing for departure. Dani has barely had time to settle into her seat when a black-haired flight attendant came up to her. Her face was strangely expressionless, bland, devoid of the usual trademark polite cheerfulness which the profession seems to ingrain in people. The nametag said “Janelle”.
“Excuse me”, the stewardess started. “Would you be willing to relocate? We’ll upgrade your class”, she added immediately, clearly aware of how to get a passenger to agree.
“To business?” Dani cocked her head questioningly.
“To first. A first-class passenger is willing to take a guest along”
Dani’s jaw almost dropped. She’s never heard of anything like this happening. Something prompted her to ask:
“Do you know who that first-class passenger is?”
“Mr. Raleigh, a famous actor”, the attendant replied. This time Dani actually gasped.
“Adam Raleigh?”
“Yes”.
Dani was in her early twenties, but wasn’t afraid of admitting that she could still be a swooning fangirl, just like your average highschooler. Adam Raleigh may have been slightly younger than her, but has been starring in so many high-scoring Hollywood blockbusters that his name was known to almost everyone. Dani loved Raleigh. No matter how weird this was, she was going to take the chance to get to be close to the object of her long-time obsession.
“Of course I agree”, she murmured. Dani Lenour flying first-class to Australia with Adam Raleigh! Who would have thought this would ever be possible? She followed after Jane, not paying any attention to the fact that nobody took the seat she supposedly had to give up.

They crossed the business class, and in a matter of minutes were standing in front of a moving door. Dani found it amusing that first-class passengers could actually enjoy private accomodations for the entirety of the flight. Janelle wordlessly left her alone. Dani gathered all of her courage and lightly knocked on the door.
“Please, come in”
She slid it sideways to be greeted by the sight of her idol standing up from a comfortable-looking red armchair. He was, of course, much taller than her - Dani was five feet tall on a good day while Raleigh easily reached six and four. His head was almost hitting the ceiling, the blonde curly hair brushing against it. His perfect lips formed a smirk of sorts, while the bright blue eyes studied Dani intently. She suddenly felt weak in the knees, feeling herself somehow out of place, unworthy to stand before the rising star of Hollywood.
“I’m Dani”, she blurted out.
“Hi Dani”, he nodded, his voice loud and boyish. “You’re probably wondering why are you here”
“Yes”, she admitted, breathing heavily and blushing.
“It’s because you’re cute”, he winked, “And because I like to travel in comfort, which entails having a girl around. Would you be willing to help me out?”
He was standing almost directly in front of her, and she had to crane her neck to look him in the eyes. Dani felt butterflies taking off in her chest. Adam Raleigh was asking her to keep him company! This was real!
“Oh god, yes”, she exclaimed. “Anything you want”.
“We’ll get to that”, he said, putting a hand on her shouder and pulling her in before closing the door behind her. He then reached into his pocket and produced a small, remote-like object, silver in color. Dani watched him press a couple of buttons.
Then, all of a sudden, her adoration for Adam Raleigh flared up with a newfound strength. She realized in all seriousness that she’s standing in the presence of her beloved celebrity. The fangirl in her took over completely, desiring nothing but to express all the devotion to the young actor.
She watched him walk back towards his armchair; he sat down and got comfortable, stretching his jean-clad legs in front of him. He then tapped his palm several times on an armrest and made an inviting gesture. Dani sheepishly stepped deeper into his chambers. Adam, with a sincere smile on his face, pointed towards the carpeted floor next to his armchair, and Dani, blushing, sat down cross-legged, once again looking up at him.
She was enchanted by his beauty and almost missed the fact she was being asked a question.
"Are you traveling alone, Dani?"
15223.title: Fangirl's Luck

1523.title: Shrink at a club/mall/school?

info.brief_description: A woman shrinks and find herself at the mercy of one of the men in her life
info.description:
I've been a long time reader here, now it's my turn to contribute my own dreams... You boys aren't the only ones who want to get shrunk ;)

So how about it... Imagine if you were fighting with your girlfriend and she shrank midfight? What would you do? Would you stomp her out of anger? ;) What if your wife was small enough to slip into your pocket? What if you could break that arrogant coworker of yours and make her your simpering pet?

I want to be any of the women above.

No rules... The girl shrinks. Use, abuse, tease her--but by all means please yourself :)
